attributes.action: Make Captain Tom Moore a Sir in the next honors list
attributes.background: For his lifetime achievements and for the money he raised for the NHS during the current crisis

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
